reference_frame.title: Ephemeris reference frame (EME2000)
reference_frame.misc: datatype based on example in JWST-ICD-013100 (FDF to SOC ICD)

type.title: Definitive or Predicted
type.description: Science Data Processing code (SDP) reads from the predicted or definitive observatory ephemeris data
type.calculation: SDP reads from the predicted or definitive observatory ephemeris data

time.title: [d] MJD time of position and velocity vectors
time.description: Time of position and velocity vectors in ephemeris (Modified Julian Date)
time.calculation: SDP reads from the predicted or definitive observatory ephemeris data

spatial_x.title: X spatial coordinate of JWST (km)
spatial_x.description: X spatial coordinate of JWST (km). Science Data Processing code (SDP) reads this from the observatory ephemeris data.
spatial_x.calculation: Value from either DefinitiveEphemeris or PredictedEphemeris tables where useAfter date is closest to the exposure's EXPMID time.

spatial_y.title: Y spatial coordinate of JWST (km)
spatial_y.description: Y spatial coordinate of JWST (km). Science Data Processing code (SDP) reads this from the observatory ephemeris data.
spatial_y.calculation: Value from either DefinitiveEphemeris or PredictedEphemeris tables where useAfter date is closest to the exposure's EXPMID time.

spatial_z.title: Z spatial coordinate of JWST (km)
spatial_z.description: Z spatial coordinate of JWST (km). Science Data Processing code (SDP) reads this from the observatory ephemeris data.
spatial_z.calculation: Value from either DefinitiveEphemeris or PredictedEphemeris tables where useAfter date is closest to the exposure's EXPMID time.

velocity_x.title: X component of JWST velocity (km/sec)
velocity_x.description: X component of JWST velocity vector (km/sec). Science Data Processing code (SDP) reads this from the observatory ephemeris data.
velocity_x.calculation: Value from either DefinitiveEphemeris or PredictedEphemeris tables where useAfter date is closest to the exposure's EXPMID time.

velocity_y.title: Y component of JWST velocity (km/sec)
velocity_y.description: Y component of JWST velocity vector (km/sec). Science Data Processing code (SDP) reads this from the observatory ephemeris data.
velocity_y.calculation: Value from either DefinitiveEphemeris or PredictedEphemeris tables where useAfter date is closest to the exposure's EXPMID time.

velocity_z.title: Z component of JWST velocity (km/sec)
velocity_z.description: Z component of JWST velocity vector (km/sec). Science Data Processing code (SDP) reads this from the observatory ephemeris data.
velocity_z.calculation: Value from either DefinitiveEphemeris or PredictedEphemeris tables where useAfter date is closest to the exposure's EXPMID time.
